section.section: Subject to § 2-1246 of this article, on or before October 31 of the year before the evaluation date of a governmental activity or unit, the Department of Legislative Services shall submit to the General Assembly an evaluation report on the governmental activity or unit.
The Department of Legislative Services shall make copies of the report available.
